topic.title: Conference Indexing
topic.section:
Search Engine Indexing. Enhance the findability of the conference in search engines by adding a description, keywords, and HTML header tags.

Register Conference for Indexing. Enhance the findability of the conference in research databases by registering with the PKP Harvester, which will make the conference being indexed in Open Archives Initiative indexes. If the site has already been registered by Site Administrator in Site Settings, this conference will be automatically indexed.
